id: The Ultimate Japan Car Culture Starter Pack
name: The Ultimate Japan Car Culture Starter Pack
description: If you don't use Notion, you'll still be emailed the PDF!Planning a car trip to Japan can be overwhelming — especially if it’s your first time. That’s why I created this starter guide, packed with firsthand tips from my own journey chasing Japan’s car culture. If you’re a car enthusiast heading to Japan, this is your jumpstart.What You’ll Get:✅ 5 must-do experiences — Daikoku PA, Hakone drives, tuning shops & more✅ My sample 3-day Tokyo itinerary built for car fans✅ Car rental tips, routes,
